sqlMap.select: SELECT ss.uri, NULL as user_name, NULL as credentials FROM sync_services ss WHERE service_id > 0 AND ss.server = 1
SELECT s.user_name, s.credentials, ss.uri FROM sync s JOIN sync_services ss USING (service_id) WHERE s.user_name = #userName# AND ss.server = 1
SELECT s.user_name, s.credentials, ss.uri FROM sync s JOIN sync_services ss USING (service_id) WHERE s.user_name = #userName# AND ss.uri = #service# AND ss.server = 1
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sync (user_name, service_id, credentials) VALUES (#userName#, #serviceId#, #credentials#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT , b.date, t.change_date FROM bibtex b JOIN tas t USING (content_id) WHERE b.user_name = #userName# GROUP BY content_id
SELECT b.book_url_hash AS intrahash, NULL AS interhash, b.date, b.change_date FROM bookmark b JOIN tas t USING (content_id) WHERE b.user_name = #userName# GROUP BY content_id

SELECT last_sync_date FROM sync_data WHERE user_name = #userName# AND content_type = #contentType# AND service_id = #serviceId# AND status != "undone" AND status != "error" ORDER BY last_sync_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT last_sync_date FROM sync_data WHERE user_name = #userName# AND content_type = #contentType# AND service_id = #serviceId# ORDER BY last_sync_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT FROM sync_data sd LEFT JOIN sync_services ss USING (service_id) WHERE sd.user_name = #userName# AND sd.content_type = #contentType# AND ss.uri = #service# AND sd.status != 'undone' ORDER BY sd.last_sync_date DESC

SELECT FROM sync_data sd LEFT JOIN sync_services ss USING (service_id) WHERE sd.user_name = #userName# AND sd.content_type = #contentType# AND sd.service_id = #serviceId# AND sd.status = 'undone' ORDER BY sd.last_sync_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT service_id FROM sync_services WHERE uri = #service# GROUP BY service_id
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sync_data (service_id, user_name, content_type, last_sync_date, status) VALUES (#serviceId#, #userName#, #contentType#, #lastSyncDate#, #status#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE sync_data SET status = #status# WHERE user_name = #userName# AND content_type = #contentType# AND service_id = #serviceId# AND last_sync_date = #lastSyncDate#
UPDATE sync SET credentials = #credentials# WHERE user_name = #userName# AND service_id=#serviceId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM sync WHERE user_name = #userName# AND service_id = #serviceId#
